_gram:

_meanings:
{@--2@} To spread, shed, diffuse;
<ls>Bk. 2. 3</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">10. 32</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">15. 91</ls>; <ls>Ku. 2. 33.</ls>

{@--7@} To stretch or bend
(as a bow).

{@--1@} To confide, trust, place
confidence in.

{@--3@} To pain or afflict with 
disease.
